arts.ttl: McGuinness nets first goal as Luton bounce back from Boro shocker by battling past Hull
Edwards praises his players' 'desire' as he knew Luton weren't 'perfect' when beating Tigers
arts.sum: Town boss reacts to Hull victory

arts.ttl: Hull City drop zone message as Tim Walter finds positive despite Luton defeat
arts.sum: "What I saw is good character from my team because they fight until the end, and especially if you run backwards in the 96th minute, Regan Slater and Cody Drameh to clear the situation, that's all you can expect as a coach. Tim Walter says he’s not concerned that Hull City have dropped into the bottom three for the second time this season after losing 1-0 to Luton Town at Kenilworth Road on Saturday afternoon as the Tigers succumbed to their third successive defeat.

arts.ttl: Mark McGuinness’ strike helps Luton bounce back with victory over Hull
arts.sum: Mark McGuinness hit the only goal of the game.

arts.ttl: Hull City sink into Championship relegation zone after latest defeat
arts.sum: City hit a post through Joao Pedro while their first effort on target didn't arrive until the 75th minute, despite having much of the ball in areas where they couldn't hurt the Hatters, and this result will only leave Walter under more pressure having lost against a side who have now leapfrogged them at the bottom end of the league. City started brightly and could haven taken the lead after just four minutes when Kamara was freed down the left, he showed superb speed to race away from Reece Burke but his decision-making lacked conviction, and his cross was cleared at the near post.

arts.ttl: Hull City player ratings vs Luton Town as Joao Pedro passes up golden chances
arts.sum: Pedro hit a post in the second half after good play from Regan Slater as City laboured to find a way back into the game, their first shot on target coming 75 minutes in through substitute Kasey Palmer's effort from distance. Joao Pedro: Offered little in the first half bar the one moment where he managed to head wide from close range.

arts.ttl: Edwards calls on Luton players to show some much-needed character if things don't go their way
arts.sum: Town's record when conceding first has been poor this season

arts.ttl: Luton Town vs Hull City LIVE match updates and reaction from Kenilworth Road
arts.sum: Coventry City vs Sheffield United (12:30) Sheffield Wednesday vs Cardiff City (12:30)

arts.ttl: Edwards discusses the 'conundrum' of trying to get Zimbabwean midfielder Nakamba fully fit for Luton
arts.sum: Ex-Aston Villa player completes two games for his country during international break

arts.ttl: Luton Town win could spark Hull City's revival admits determined Tim Walter
arts.sum: "Maybe it's helpful, yeah," Walter said on the subject of playing in a tight stadium, like Loftus Road - the scene of City's second away win of the season. Walter, like Ilicali, believes City have not had the rub of the green in recent weeks but hopes that it will turn within the tight confines of Kenilworth Road against a physical side that will put his side under serious aerial threat.
